title: Kid Rock Wears ‘Dumbf*ckistan’ T-Shirt
subtitle: We are obliged to report that the photo of Kid Rock wearing a profanity-laced electoral map T-shirt is fake, though apparel resembling this does exist.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Kid Rock was photographed wearing a t-shirt featuring an electoral map in which blue states are labeled "Dumbfuckistan."
